content: lion brand pattern # 10420 *chs-diagonalstripethrow pdf* skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 2 colors 7 balls total *adirondack & rococo* work in color stripe pattern single_crochet from corner to corner finish with crochet border also available on joann com pc00110a diagonal crochet afghan 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www joann com/diagonal-crochet-afghan/pc00110 html
